price: Sε Yεsesa wͻn de wͻn a wͻyε kyεn wͻn bεhyε wͻn anan mu, na εno ntumi mmu mfa yεn so, (anaasε εnnyε den mma Yεn).
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
